metadata.name: Potential Linux Process Code Injection Via DD Utility
metadata.comment: Detects the injection of code by overwriting the memory map of a Linux process using the "dd" Linux command.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('4') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/dd')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('of=')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/proc/')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/mem')))

output.summary: Detects the injection of code by overwriting the memory map of a Linux process using the "dd" Linux command.
